text:
My Clinical Question (condition: osteoporosis): ***

My most current assessment of this problem can be found in the note dated {Today/***}.

required_info: Has patient ever had a fracture? If yes, was it a fragility fracture?
If female, is the patient pre- or post-menopausal?
What are patient’s bone density results?
Is there a family history of fracture, particularly hip fracture?
Has the patient been treated with prednisone or other glucocorticoids?
Has the patient had amenorrhea? Any history of growth or development delay?
Does the patient have any renal or gastrointestinal issues?
What is the patient’s treatment history with osteoporosis?
optional_info: Any intolerance or contraindications to oral bisphosphonates? (If yes, please describe)
Has the patient had a fracture while taking an oral bisphosphonate?
